summary: AN ORDINANCE, relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation; authorizing the Superintendent to execute a grant agreement with the Howard Hughes Medical Institute for "Sound Science," creating a new position within the Department; increasing the expenditure allowance of the Department of Parks and Recreation's 2001 Adopted Budget; and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Park and Recreation Fund therefor, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
